name: THRESHOLD_VALUES
description: Patient-specific reference range values and related information.

columns.name: RECORD_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier (.1 item) for the patient threshold record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this contact. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this contact.

columns.name: HIGH_VALUE
columns.description: High value for the reference range

columns.name: LOW_VALUE
columns.description: Low value for the reference range

columns.name: FROM_TM
columns.description: Beginning instant for the reference range for when it should be used

columns.name: TILL_TM
columns.description: Ending instant for when the reference range should be used

columns.name: WHO_CHANGED_ID
columns.description: The unique ID representing the employee who entered the data corresponding to this line.

columns.name: WHO_CHANGED_ID_NAME
columns.description: The name of the user record. This name may be hidden.

columns.name: WHEN_TM
columns.description: Instant when the data in this line was changed.

columns.name: COMMENTS
columns.description: Comments about the reference range represented by the current line.

columns.name: FROM_UTC_DTTM
columns.description: Beginning instant (UTC, used for new values) for when this reference range should be used.

columns.name: TILL_UTC_DTTM
columns.description: Ending instant (UTC, used for new values) for when this reference range should be used.
